verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I’m living on the mountain, underneath a cloudless sky.
I’m drinking
at the fountain
that never shall run dry;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
O yes!
I’m feasting on the manna from a bountiful supply,
For I am dwelling
in Beulah Land.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Far away the noise of strife upon my ear is falling,
Then I know the sins of earth beset on ev’ry hand:

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Doubt and fear and things of earth in vain to me are calling,
None of these shall move me from Beulah Land.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Far below the storm of doubt upon the world is beating,
Sons of men in battle long
the enemy withstand:

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Safe am I within the castle
of God’s word retreating,
Nothing then can reach me’
tis Beulah Land.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let the stormy breezes blow, their cry cannot alarm me;
I am safely sheltered here, protected by God’s hand:

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Here the sun is always shining, here there’s naught can harm me,
I am safe forever
in Beulah Land.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Viewing here the works
of God, I sink in contemplation,
Hearing now His blessed voice, I see the way He planned

verse.name: v4b
